release.action: Added possibility to wrap views and specify reference data providers at the view resolver level, making it easier to provide consistent sets of related views.
Added a handler interceptor that redirects to a re-written URL when the request URI matches a given regular expression
Wildcards ('*') are now allowed in port and protocol assertions.
Added ...util.beans.comparator and two bean comparators
Added preliminary support for HTTP/Digest authentication.
Fixed nullpointer in plaintext edit.
TabsProvider and ActionBarProvider replaced by menu component
Added menu component
Reworked/generalized categorizable functionality
Added API support for rejecting invalid authentication requests.
Added HTTP status codes to request/access logging.
Adding/deleting users/groups allows for multiple csv users at once
Added new FreemarkerConfig implementation, MultiTemplateLocationsFreeMarkerConfigurer, looking up (possibly) multiple template locations in the application context
Catching possible IllegalArgumentException when clients send unparsable date header
Updated ResourcePrincipalPermissionAssertion to avoid matching when the repository is in read-only mode.
Modified the mechanism for cleaning up expired locks to perform all the work directly in the data access layer, instead of first loading the resources.
Put will now try to guess content type based on file extension when the client sends application/octet-stream
Added a new view implementation, 'StandardHttpView' that allows parameterization of status code and headers.
Moved to Spring 1.2 final
Fixed NullPointerException error with error handler resolving when no service is yet resolved.
Fixed bug in EvenStructuredText. It was unable to handle unfinished links at the end of the text (i.e. "laLA":[end-of-text])
Authentication exceptions are no longer logged at level WARN when checking resources and requests for 'If-Modified-Since' dates before the actual request processing.
FilteringViewWrapper now bails out (aborting the filter sequence) when it discovers that the wrapped response has an unsupported character encoding. The original response is written instead.
Extended child assertion with optional assertion property to be tested against child
Stale http sessions are now detected in the security initializer. A new session is created if the old one was invalid.
Composite view now avoids writing body on HEAD requests.
XSLT now handles transformations with content type 'application/xhtml+xml' (XHTML) properly.
Servlet requests getting a '304 Not Modified' response are now logged as 'cached by client', and not the other way around.
Fixed character encoding issue with BufferedResponseWrapper.
Improved logging for data access layer.
Improved error logging for dispatcher servlet
Parameterized lock timeouts for XML edit controllers
Fix for illegal (expired) session states
Locks that have expired, but have not yet been removed by the lock-cleaning thread are not loaded anymore.
The correct timezone (UTC) is now used when returning the WebDAV 'creationdate' property.
Modification timestamps on collections are now correctly updated when creating child resources.

Added the ability to associate error handlers with a service tree. When a service is specified for an error handler, the handler is not selected unless the service of the request is the same as or a descendant of the specified service.
Fixed lock discovery functionality in XML edit component (re-locking previously failed due to a bug)
WebDAV now returns the correct lock timeout on 'lockdiscovery' PROPFIND request. Fixes some issues with Microsoft Office and lock refreshing.
Factored out services' ability to 'categorize' their parent into a specific parent property
Factored out services' Categorizable functionality into its own interface
Added a new MessageSource implementation that looks up other message sources in the application context and delegates lookups to them.
Implemented HTTP HEAD handling, both for FreeMarkerView and DisplayResourceView.
Fixed crash in HtmlHeadContentFilter HTML head elements containing the '$' character.

Added RequestURIRegexpWrappingAssertion, for selectively applying assertions based on regular expression matching on the request URI. One use case for such an assertion is to require that certain subtrees in the URI space are only accessible through https.
Added LinkConstructor as an optional parameter to xsl transformation with ResourceXsltView. This makes it possible to create links from within xsl.
Refactored/bug fixed getAbsolutePath() in AbstractPathBasedURIResolver. Not extensively tested.

It is now possible for services to 'hook into' another service trough a new category-based lookup system, avoiding the need to explicitly refer to child services from an existing service. (As a consequence, services may now belong to more than one category.)
Added refresh functionality to the document templates listing component for creating new documents.
Improved character encoding for HTML documents in plaintext editing component. Now checks actual HTML content for meta tags if no character encoding is set on the resource itself.
Initial release
